title: Drawing, "Dining Room or Board Room", early 20th century
medium: Black ink and graphite on illustration board, ruled border in graphite
description: Dining room or board room with partial view of room in background at center. Sideboard on left wall with rounded curves and straight back; cabinet door on each end, drawers (?) at center. Long oval table in lower right; rectangular shape at center of table. Five (visible) armchairs surrounding table. Armchairs upholstered on back, arms, and seat. Curved back becomes armrests, straight front legs, splayed backlegs. Area rug underneath table and chairs. Unadorned fireplace on right with rectangular mirror (?) above. Entrance to room in background has curtain pulled to right side, rounded wall on left side. Low, armless sofa in room in background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Dining Room or Board Room", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Black ink and graphite on illustration board, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-6.
